mapper.select: select p.p_no, pd.pd_scene, pd.pd_image, p.p_name, p.p_price, p.p_url, p.p_address, p.p_daddress from product p inner join product_detail pd on p.p_no = pd.p_no where p.p_no = #{pNo}
mapper.insert: insert into product (p_no, m_no, w_no, p_name, p_price, p_url, p_address, p_daddress, p_check, p_view, p_date) values (product_no_seq.nextval, #{pMno}, #{pWno}, #{pName}, #{pPrice}, #{pUrl}, #{pAddress}, #{pDaddress}, #{pCheck}, #{pView}, sysdate)
insert into product_detail (pd_no, p_no, pd_image, pd_scene) values (pd_no_seq.nextval, #{pNo}, #{pdImage}, #{pdScene})
